title: Du Cabinet de Mr. Poullain, Plate 21 from Cabinet Poullalin: Collection de cent-vingt estampes graves d'après les tableaux & dessins que composient le Cabinet de M. Poullain

description: view of river with ducks lower right, several small boats and a windmill at right middle ground; village in distance right
